timeline.description: Security-focused role with hands-on experience across SIEM, EDR, email security, and vulnerability management
responsibilities: Monitored, analyzed, and investigated security incidents to identify and mitigate potential threats using SIEM, EDR, and email security platforms
Performed alert triage, root cause analysis, and escalation to ensure timely incident containment and remediation
Collaborated with IT, infrastructure, and security teams to develop and support incident response workflows and security policies
Managed multiple client environments, delivering proactive security monitoring and tailored detection and response based on each client's risk profile
Supported SIEM onboarding, deployment, and detection content development to enhance threat visibility and reduce false positives
Prepared and presented weekly and monthly security reports, translating technical findings into actionable insights for stakeholders
highlights: Managed security operations for multiple high-profile clients across different industries
Reduced false positive rate through custom detection rule development
Successfully onboarded and deployed SIEM solutions for new client environments

timeline.description: System health monitoring and Active Directory management role
responsibilities: Performed system health monitoring covering Active Directory (AD), including user account status, login issues, and group policy-related checks
Maintained basic AD hygiene and user access monitoring to ensure security compliance
Monitored hardware health and system availability: server uptime, CPU, memory, disk utilization
Identified and escalated performance or availability issues to appropriate teams
Supported user-related system issues and coordinated with internal teams for resolution
highlights: Maintained high system availability through proactive monitoring
Improved incident response times through effective coordination with internal teams

timeline.description: Internship focused on SIEM and EDR tool deployment and security monitoring
responsibilities: Assisted during SIEM and EDR tool deployment phases
Worked with Elastic Stack (on-premises deployment) for security monitoring
Observed and handled basic security alerts generated from authentication events, system logs, and endpoint activity
Gained hands-on experience with log ingestion, normalization, and alert triage
Supported security team in day-to-day monitoring and incident response activities
highlights: Successfully deployed and configured Elastic Stack for security monitoring
Developed foundational skills in SIEM operations and alert triage
